items.sentence: I'm looking forward to hearing what Tom thinks.
I try to spend as much time as I can in Boston.
Tom spends three weeks every year in Australia.
Tom and Mary interrupt each other all the time.
This is the package that I've been waiting for.
Tom didn't seem to notice that Mary was crying.
Tom is the only Canadian working in our office.
Tom was a very fussy eater when he was a child.
Tom wants to know if you have time to help him.
I had no idea that Mary was your granddaughter.
